news.title: China confirms details of U.S. trade deal
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump said that both sides had signed a trade deal, without providing further details. The statement came after U.S.-China trade talks.

news.title: Core inflation rate rose to 2.7% in May, more than expected, Fed’s preferred gauge shows
news.summary: The PCE price index was projected to rise 0.1% in May, with the annual inflation rate at 2.3%, according to the Dow Jones consensus.

news.title: Hemi V-8 engines and mechanical bull rides: Inside Stellantis' plan to revive its Ram Trucks brand after yearslong sales declines
news.summary: Ram CEO Tim Kuniskis' turnaround plan for Stellantis' truck brand includes the return of Hemi V-8 engines, mechanical bulls and other untraditional plans.

news.title: We checked out Tesla's supervised, invite-only robotaxi launch. Here's what we saw
news.summary: CEO Elon Musk has been promising that Tesla vehicles were on the cusp of full autonomy. Since 2016, Musk has said that Tesla cars were on their way to being fully autonomous.

news.title: Trump's war against the Powell Fed has taken another political turn
news.summary: The words now could signal action. Trump's name-calling of Powell isn't particularly new. But the words now may signal action in the future.

news.title: Nike’s stock is headed for a ‘swoosh’-shaped recovery after years of pain, analyst says
news.summary: Nike Inc. has endured a tough few years marked by weaker demand and its own struggles to adapt to shifting trends. The athletic-gear and sneaker maker's fourth-quarter results Thursday were hardly spectacular.

news.title: Consumers cut spending on cars and other goods when tariffs kicked in. What will they do next?
news.summary: Consumer spending falls in May for first time in four months. U.S. consumer spending down 0.3% in May, down 0% from April.

news.title: Inflation creeps higher in May and dims chances of the Fed cutting interest rates soon
news.summary: The cost of living rose slowly in May for the third month in a row. The rate of inflation is probably still too high for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates soon.

news.title: This guy has 45 credit cards. Here’s what you can learn from his strategy.
news.summary: Dave Grossman carries a “Costanza wallet,” and he says he’s reaped rewards aplenty as a result.

news.title: Why a breakthrough on rare earths is easing U.S.-China trade tensions
news.summary: President Donald Trump said a deal had been signed “yesterday’ with China. He offered no details on what the deal was or when it would be signed.
